message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's in your best interest to accept now, as the money will be worth less with every round that passes.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Considering the inflation, I believe this is a fair split.
Bob, let's be realistic. The value of the money is going down for you with every round. I'm offering you $45. Take it now, or risk getting even less later.
I understand the pressure of inflation, but I'm not ready to give up yet. This is my counteroffer, considering the current situation.
Bob, the clock is ticking. You're losing ground with each passing round. I'm offering you $48. It's the best you'll get at this point. Don't let your stubbornness cost you even more.
